topComments.author: Michelle Corbin
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um √≥timo parque aqu√°tico da cidade acess√≠vel para divers√£o em fam√≠lia. Fomos no Ester Sunday e n√£o estava lotado. Muita sombra e cadeiras sob guarda-s√≥is enormes. Embora algumas das cadeiras precisassem de uma boa limpeza. Eles n√£o t√™m cabanas privadas. √â uma base de primeiro a chegar, primeiro a salvar. Voc√™ estar√° compartilhando seu espa√ßo com outras pessoas, pois as cadeiras est√£o pr√≥ximas umas das outras. O parque √© pequeno e atende mais √†s crian√ßas mais novas. Uma das melhores coisas sobre este parque √© que ele tem um rio lento! Eles tamb√©m t√™m uma √°rea infantil de tamanho decente e dois escorregas de 40 p√©s para as crian√ßas maiores. Um pequeno estande de concess√£o estava aberto que servia apenas √°gua, sorvetes, alguns lanches e sorvetes. Uma m√°quina de venda autom√°tica est√° na entrada com refrigerantes e bebidas energ√©ticas. Voc√™ tem permiss√£o para trazer sua pr√≥pria comida, ent√£o planeje com anteced√™ncia. NOTA: Tentei pedir pizza para entrega, mas eles n√£o entregam nesse local, voc√™ precisa busc√°-la a cerca de 5 minutos de carro. Este era Domin√≥. A equipe foi muito simp√°tica. Tivemos um incidente infeliz com outro patrono e eles lidaram com a situa√ß√£o muito profissionalmente. Eu definitivamente voltaria aqui. √â menos ca√≥tico do que um parque aqu√°tico maior, n√£o lotado, acess√≠vel e voc√™ pode trazer seu pr√≥prio refrigerador com comida e bebida.  (Original) A great affordable city water park for some family fun. We went on Ester Sunday and it wasn‚Äôt packed at all. Plenty of shade and chairs under huge umbrellas. Although some of the chairs needed a good cleaning. They do not have any private cabanas. It‚Äôs a first come first save basis. You will be sharing your space with others as the chairs are right next to each other. The park is small and caters more towards younger children. One of the best things about this park is that it has a lazy river! They also have a decent sized kiddy play area and two 40ft slides for the bigger children. A small concession stand was open that served water, icees, a few snacks and ice cream bars only. A vending machine is at the entrance with sodas and energy drinks. You are allowed to bring in your own food, so plan ahead. NOTE: I tried to order pizza for delivery but they do not deliver to that location, you have to go pick it up about a 5min drive away. This was Dominoes. The staff was very friendly. We had an unfortunate incident with another patron and they handled the situation very professionally. I would definitely go back here. It‚Äôs less chaotic than a bigger water park, not crowded, affordable and you can bring your own cooler with food and drinks.

topComments.author: Elisa A
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© realmente um √≥timo parque aqu√°tico do bairro. N√£o s√≥ o pre√ßo √© decente, mas depois de 3p cada bilhete √© quase $ 2 a menos. Ent√£o voc√™ recebe 3-5p por um pre√ßo menor, o que, se estiver com um or√ßamento apertado, torna mais f√°cil levar as crian√ßas por menos! Eles t√™m alguma comida aqui, mas nada que valha a pena mencionar. Os icees s√£o √≥timos especialmente para um dia quente! Eles t√™m um rio lento, 2 tobo√°guas maiores, uma piscina, um pequeno curso de escalada de corda sobre a piscina e uma √°rea enorme para crian√ßas com tobo√°guas menores e √°gua na altura da cintura para os mais pequenos! √â onde passamos a maior parte do nosso tempo l√°, pois nossos filhos adoram! Eles t√™m banheiros enormes com arm√°rios tamb√©m, se voc√™ trouxer coisas que n√£o quer deixar de fora. Eles tamb√©m t√™m muitas mesas, fora do parque, para que voc√™ possa fazer um piquenique se levar seu pr√≥prio almo√ßo! (Eles n√£o permitem comida/bebida de fora no parque aqu√°tico) No geral, √© um √≥timo lugar para passar algumas horas em um dia quente!  (Original) This is a really great Neighborhood water park. Not only is the price decent, but after 3p each ticket is almost $2 less. So you get 3-5p for a less price which if your on a tight budget it makes it easier to take the kids for less! They have some food here, but nothing worth mentioning. The icees are great especially for a hot day! They have a lazy river, 2 larger slides, a pool, a small rope climb course over the pool and a huge area for kids with smaller slides and about waist deep water for little ones! That‚Äôs where we spend most of our time there as our kids love it! They have have huge bathrooms with lockers too, if you bring things you don‚Äôt wanna leave out. They also have lots of tables too, outside of the park, so you can picnic on if you bring your own lunch! (They don‚Äôt allow food/drink from outside in the water park) Overall it‚Äôs a great place to spend a few hours on a hot day!

topComments.author: lyudmila korneyeva
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo este lugar, pequeno parque muito confort√°vel, todas as aventuras pr√≥ximas umas das outras, bom para crian√ßas e adultos, voc√™ pode trazer sua pr√≥pria comida, qualquer bebida üç∫ e relaxar o dia todo  (Original) Love this place very comfortable small park all adventures close to each other good for any kids ages and adults, you can bring your own food any drinks üç∫, and make chill all day

topComments.author: Diana R
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitei hoje. O lugar era divertido e limpo em torno das √°reas de √°gua. O √∫nico lugar que estava sujo eram os banheiros. Voc√™ pode ver e sentir o cheiro da sujeira. O estande de concess√£o estava fechado, n√£o havia comida √† venda, mas refrigeradores e comida eram permitidos neste dia. A equipe foi extremamente simp√°tica e prestativa. Rio lento divertido, toneladas de estacionamento, n√£o muito lotado, n√£o caro, √°rea de recrea√ß√£o rasa com tobo√°guas para crian√ßas pequenas ou n√£o nadadores, piscina profunda para adultos e tobo√°guas m√©dios para todos. √ìtimo lugar no geral, apenas banheiros precisam de uma boa limpeza para desinfetar e desodorizar.  (Original) Visited Today.The place was fun and clean around the water areas. The only place that was filthy were the restrooms. You can see and smell the filth. The concession stand was closed, no food for sale but coolers and food were allowed on this day. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Fun lazy river, tons of parking, not too crowded, not expensive, shallow play area with slides for small children or non swimmers, deep pool for adults and medium slides for everyone. Great place overall, only restrooms need a good cleaning to disinfect and deodorize.

Muito devagar. Sem comida. Traga o seu pr√≥prio. Mas nada de coolers. No geral, um bom tempo. Definitivamente vou novamente.  (Original) Awesome place. Line is a little slow for purchasing tickets and also the line for the bigger slide is long also though not worth the thrill lol. Very slow. No food. Bring your own. But no coolers. Overall a good time. Definitely going again.

(Original) Seemed like a nice place. My family didn‚Äôt get to stay to long before we had to leave due to a family emergency.

topComments.comment: One of our favorite things to do on the weekend with our kids. Affordable family fun and we always make new friends.

Chegue cedo pois o lugar lota r√°pido. Uma √≥tima escapada em fam√≠lia para se refrescar a um pre√ßo razo√°vel.  (Original) Great for younger kids. There is a lazy river, kids play area, obstacle course, and water slides. Get there early as the place fills up fast. A great family escape to cool off at a reasonable price.

topComments.author: P√§ula Z√ømema
topComments.comment: I really like this place, it's super fun but my issue is with the restrooms. I don't remember the last time I saw it clean and i have been there many times because is close of my home.  The restrooms are very dirty and smells very bad, I'm not the first person saying that, please keep the restrooms clean!!!

topComments.author: A L
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Meus filhos e eu vamos a este parque aqu√°tico de vez em quando. N√£o √© t√£o bom quanto antes. O estande das concess√µes est√° fechado e os banheiros s√£o nojentos. A √∫ltima vez que fomos a √°gua estava muito quente. Quase como uma banheira de hidromassagem. N√£o tenho certeza do que eles podem fazer, mas nunca estive em uma piscina quente. Eles precisam fazer algo para resfriar a √°gua. A √°gua quente n√£o √© refrescante em um clima de 95 graus.  (Original) My kids and I go to this water park from time to time. It is not as nice as it once was. The concessions stand is now closed and the bathrooms are disgusting. The last time we went the water was very warm. Almost like a hot tub. I‚Äôm not sure what they can do but I have never been to a hot pool. They need to do something to cool the water. Hot water is not refreshing in 95 degree weather.

topComments.author: Millie Cuevas
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tenho 50 anos e adoro ir l√° n√£o tenho mais beb√™s mas me divirto um pouco caro mas ok Eu sou uma crian√ßa no cora√ß√£o, eu amo as quedas d'√°gua e o rio lento  (Original) I‚Äôm 50 and I loooovvvveeeee going there I have no more babies but I enjoy myself a little bit pricy but ok I‚Äôm a kids in heart I love the water falls and lazy river

topComments.author: carol howard
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu tentei este parque aqu√°tico mais uma vez, esperando que melhorasse. Eu dei-lhe duas estrelas porque a jovem que nos check-in e um salva-vidas foram simp√°ticos e cort√™s. Infelizmente, isso √© tudo de bom que posso denunciar! Todo o lugar precisa ser limpo e ter um facelift. As cadeiras s√£o cobertas com mofo e sujeira com muitos deles em condi√ß√µes prec√°rias. Toda a √°rea, incluindo a piscina, precisa ser lavada ao m√≠nimo. Durante a minha visita, havia pelo menos 10 campos escolares. Cada grupo teve uma m√©dia de 20 crian√ßas com supervis√£o m√≠nima da equipe da escola e / ou salva-vidas !! No meio da tarde, o banheiro estava destru√≠do. E os clientes pagantes receberam um grande guarda-chuva para ficarem sentados, enquanto o restante estava reservado para as escolas. Ent√£o, eu paguei US $ 40 para quatro pessoas para entrar em um parque aqu√°tico sujo com crian√ßas em grande parte sem supervis√£o. Para ser justo, observei que havia muitas crian√ßas por escola adulta. Eu acredito que os guardas da vida deveriam estar mais dispon√≠veis para o controle de multid√µes. Se voc√™ realmente quer um pequeno dia aqu√°tico, aproveite a viagem para o Sailfish Water Park em Stuart. Os pre√ßos s√£o os mesmos, mas as comodidades s√£o muito melhores e os guardas da vida manter o parque seguro e bem controlado. A piscina l√° √© intocada üëç  (Original) I tried this water park one more time hoping it got better. I gave it two stars because the young lady who check us in and one life guard were friendly and courteous. Unfortunately, that is all the good i can report!  The whole place needs to be cleaned and have a facelift. The chairs are covered with mold and grime with many of them In disrepair. The entire area including the pool needs to be power washed at a minimum.  During my visit, there were at least 10 school camps there. Each group averaged about 20 kids with minimal supervision from the school staff and/or lifeguards!! By mid afternoon , the bathroom was trashed.  And the paying customers were allocated one large umbrella to sit under while the rest were reserved for the schools. So bottom line, I paid $40 for four people to get in to a dirty water park overrun with largely unsupervised kids. To be fair, i observed that there were too many kids per school adult.  I believe the life guards should have been more available for crowd control. If you truly want a small waterpark fun day, take the trip to Sailfish Water Park in Stuart. Prices are the same but the amenities are so much better and the life guards keep the park safe and well controlled.  The pool there is pristine üëç

topComments.author: Ahmed Gewiley
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um bom parque. √â barato e o rio lento e as √°reas das crian√ßas s√£o muito agrad√°veis. A comida n√£o √© cara em sua maior parte. Os deslizamentos s√£o um pouco desconfort√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãpara descer porque os sulcos s√£o muito pronunciados. Cuidado com as crian√ßas do acampamento - √© um parque pequeno, ent√£o eles parecem muito lotados, especialmente no rio lento. Vem cedo!  Esta √© mais uma alternativa de √∫ltimo recurso para parques aqu√°ticos reais como Rapids. √â bom por algumas horas, mas s√≥ isso.  (Original) It's an okay park. It's cheap and the lazy river and the kids areas are pretty nice. Food isn't expensive for the most part. The slides are a bit uncomfortable to go down because the ridges are really pronounced. Beware of camp kids -- it's a small park so they make it feel very crowded, especially in the lazy river. Come early!  This is more of a last resort alternative to real water parks like Rapids. It's nice for a few hours but that's about it.

topComments.author: Jennifer Allen
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A equipe foi tipo e eficiente A instala√ß√£o foi muito bem mantido (√°gua era limpo, cadeiras eram limpos, algumas pequenas reparos cosm√©ticos poderia ser feito) Nossa filha absolutamente Entes e assim o fez qualquer outro garoto l√°. A minha √∫nica reclama√ß√£o √© a comida foi abaixo da m√©dia. Eu recomendo comer em algum lugar perto em seu lugar.  (Original) The staff was kind and efficient The facility was pretty well maintained (water was clean, chairs were clean, a few minor cosmetic repairs could be done) Our daughter absolutely loved it and so did every other kid there. My only complaint is the food was below average. I recommend eating somewhere close instead.

topComments.author: Jenifer faiotto
topComments.comment: The park is dated and dirty! Got sting by a Wasp by the Water Slide stairs, there are tons of them. A lifeguard told me to go and get a sting pad by the entrance, she said stings are really common at the park.

topComments.author: Tonmy Ambrose
